name: Square the Squares
description:
Controls:

  • Click where to place the next block
  • That's it
  • Just click

Scoring Rules

  • Blocks break when 3 or more of the same colour are next to each other
  • Each block gives points
  • Blocks that are further from the middle give more point
  • Every extra block over 3 in a chain, doubles the score from that chain

Lose if:

  • Take too long to place a block
  • The board is gets too unbalanced
  • You stack more than 5 blocks upwards. (You can have 5 in a stack, but 6 will make you lose)

Aim for a high score, plan ahead for big combos, and have fun!
